properties.name: Hajjiabad, Hajjiabad County, Hormozgan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Hajjiabad, Hajjiabad County, Hormozgan Province, Iran

Type: 491

Location: Iran

Hajjiabad (Persian: حاجي اباد or حاجی‌آباد, also Romanized as Ḩājjīābād and Hājiābād) is a city and capital of Hajjiabad County, Hormozgan Province, Iran. Hajjiabad is located about 100 km north of Bandar Abbas (capital of Hormozgan Province) and i...
